website_summaries.verdict: Great for pet lovers who are looking for a carpet cleaner specifically for their needs.
pros: Includes pet urine eliminator, upholstery tool, and CleanShot Pretreater
Express Clean Mode allows carpets to dry in about an hour
cons: Some buyers say the upholstery tool doesn't work very well

customer_reviews.title: Product great, Amazon pricing no so great
customer_reviews.text: Have to say while I'm happy with the cleaner, I'm upset with Amazon pricing. No sooner started using it then I see an infomercial on TV to buy it directly from Bissell for essentially the same price as Amazon, free S&H, PLUS comes with a 10' hose (instead of 8), 3-in1 stair tool ($51) and stain trapper tool ($49)
customer_reviews.author: gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: Worst carpet cleaner EVER!! What happen to the Bissel we used to be able to depend on?
customer_reviews.text: Worst carpet cleaner EVER!! The bottom is like a vacuum cleaner and just brushes on floor....emptied a whole clean water tank on carpet and there was ONLY LESS THEN A CUP OF DIRTY WATER....so now it will take hours for my carpet to dry. Unit has NO SUCTION POWER FOR DIRTY WATER.....SO CARPETS STILL DIRTY!! Yes...I went over the carpet several times....I've had a Bissell pro before...no problems with it till it stopped spraying...it was about 5 years old so bought this to replace one that worked beautifully....had a bottom to it too...this was MORE EXPENSIVE...and is absolutely worthless...called bissel...their representative...could not understand her broken english...no help at all...sending back....worst product ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw, advise you don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: By poor design, the roller brush continues to spin when you are using the hand tools. They direct you not to let it remain in one place for very long so that while trying to clean upholstery or stairs with the hand tool you must stop and move the machine around or risk damage to the carpet or floor. If the cord is underneath it , the rollers strip the wire’s protection off. The continuous spin rips the brush pices out of the roller and destroys the roller belt. At two months from receipt of the machine it is useless to me and I’m one month past Amazons return. Would not buy If you ever want to use hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: Water in newly arrived unit. Refurbished?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just unpacked the item and find water droplets and condensation in the unit (see photo). I haven’t even assembled it yet. I can’t think of a reason why there would be water in a brand new unit, unless it’s a return. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up as well
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked amazingly. I had dog pet stains all in the carpet and it picked up hair even the Dyson vacuum didn't get! Easy clean up as well.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: LEMON out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions to attach the handle to the unit upon receiving it. The brushes did not spin, and the motor emanated a terrible burning smell. Bissell also had awful customer service and after an hour on the phone with them, we finally had to ask for a supervisor who suggested we take our brand new steam cleaner to a service center. Will not purchase Bissell ever again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brynolf

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: This is the actual worst purchase I've ever made. To begin with, this awful thing didn't even come assembled correctly, so I had to disassemble and discover the belt wasn't attached properly. Even now I'm not convinced it is working as it should. It is the absolutely cheapest design I have ever experienced and I'm 98% sure it has left my rugs dirtier than when I started. Returning is obviously an insane headache to even consider.... so please save yourself the time and annoyance and don't order in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a Hoover but after many years of use it didn't clean as well. Decided to go with the Bissell Proheat 2x Revolution Pet Pro. It cleans well but when using the attachments the brush on the main unit continues to run. This doesn't work well on hardwood floors when cleaning upholstery. The main unit brush on the Hoover could be turned off. I called Bissell thinking I was missing something. Their reply was the brush can't be turned off and their recommendation was that I just lean the machine back so the spinning brush didn't hit the floor. Very big design flaw in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoys music

customer_reviews.title: Leaked/left carpets soaked
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to typically leave reviews unless I'm completely unsatisfied. I order this carpet cleaner and was super excited. Unfortunately the first one I ordered leaked from the solution tank. It also left my carpet soaked. So I ordered a second one to replace the first one in hopes that I just got a defected carpet cleaner. However after a few uses the second ones did the exact same thing. I won't be ordering this model ever again. What a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No suction power!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the good reviews and the ability to take apart and clean all of the parts. I have used it twice and both times have been very disappointed. There is barely any suction. After using half of the clean water tank the dirty water tank is not even a quarter full, leaving the carpet wet. The first time I used the deep clean mode and it took over 24 hours for my carpet to dry. And it looked no different than when I started. The 2nd time I used the quick clean setting and of course the carpet dried quicker, but the carpet still did not look clean. I will never purchase another Bissell product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carpet cleaner is great! Upholstery tool is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my carpets and couches. The carpet cleaner (main machine) is fantastic! It cleans and leaves the carpet only damp. It extracts most of the water. Very good! The upholstery tool is terrible. Hard to use, the trigger is hard to hold down, and it leaves everything very wet. Hated it. It's easy to put together, the instructions are straightforward and easy to follow. It's easy to fill and empty while using. I just finished my giant dining room and it looks great. I'm resting before I take it apart to clean. I wanted to write down my thoughts before I forget them.
customer_reviews.author: Iretnil

customer_reviews.title: Does a very good job
customer_reviews.text: I had a few issues with my product. Customer service was helpful as were the videos. When using the hose attachment I was unable to get the water to spray consistently. I am not really sure if I didn't have the clean water tank on just right but after "priming" it did work quite well. My carpet is 30 years old and has given new life to my stairs. I would recommend but would like to warn others not to hesitate to call for assistance if you have a similar issue upon first use.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my Bissell Proheat 2X Revolution Pet Pro carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my Bissell Proheat 2X Revolution Pet Pro carpet cleaner. One flaw - when you use the attachments the brushes on the main unit continue to spin. So if it's sitting in one spot for very long it could ruin your carpet in that one spot. My thought is to put a piece of cardboard under the brushes to keep from ruining my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: USAconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Does not extract dirty water
customer_reviews.text: I compared this Bissell Proheat 2x Revolution to an older model Hoover. Using 10 cups of clean water, the Hoover picked up 7.5 cups of extracted water. When using 10 cups of clean water with this Bissell, only 1 cup was extracted. That tells me there's a bunch of dirty water left on the carpet where the Bissell was used. I will be returning and sticking with the Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: THERESA C.

customer_reviews.title: I love the ability to take apart the machine and properly ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to take apart the machine and properly clean out the nozzle and brushes. That alone makes this a completely worthy product to me. The only reason I dont give it 5 stars is because when cleaning my plush carpets, versus the berber style ones, i had to dump the dirty water container 2x for every full clean water fill in order to 'unclog' it. Still, it cleaned well and the carpets were dry enough to replace furniture within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing issue, It leaks water.
customer_reviews.text: I have had to exchange this 3 times due to a leak issue and they all have the same problem. I really loved it, so easy to use but I took two stars off because of the leaks. The leaks leave soaking wet spots in the carpet that eventually dry. Ive been trying to figure out why they all have this issue and have filed a complaint. Besides that it is compact, easy to use and I wish it didnt have that leak :( I will probably end up having to return it and purchasing a completely different machine unless the manufacturer can do something about it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Belt broke within two hours of use
customer_reviews.text: The machine did what it purported, but the drive belt that turns the brushes broke before I could even get two rugs cleaned. Also cleaning it after use is tedious. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have not shampooed my carpets for over a year and between my kids, their friends, a dog and a cat, my carpets were filthy! I didn't have much hope for getting them clean, but this cleaner really did the job well! I used the sample jugs provided and cleaned my whole living room. The water it extracted was nearly black! So gross, but I'm so glad to have beautiful carpets again!
customer_reviews.author: CyeatonRN

customer_reviews.title: This machine is brand new. Used it once n ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is brand new. Used it once n it's doing the same thing my older did. It does not pickup water. It's not worth the money. Need to get refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this product. My wall to wall carpet looks brand new. There were pet stains that I tried to remove manually that left it less than good. Wasn't sure if this shampooed would even touch them. Yikes, they are completely gone. So, with that outcome I have ordered the vacuum. PS there were balls of cat hair that we're extracted from my rug!!! My Electrolux never picked them up from way down below.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: I love this carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this carpet cleaner! This comes with a 1 gallon water fill tank that is "separate" from the dirty water tank. No "bladder". Yay! Easy to use, easy to change dirty water. Has a removalable cover over the brushes, making it easier to remove pet hair. Does a great job! I would highly recommend this product over all Bissell carpet cleaners. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley H.

customer_reviews.title: All broken 😡
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research on this cleaner before purchasing it. After I got it out and went to put it together several pieces were missing there is no hardware I finally got to put together and went to use it and the button to recline it was missing. I mess with that got it to recline started using it in the wheel fell off. After looking the wheel is broken they're sending me a replacement but now I have to get the water out of my floor and take this big heavy thing back apart and put it in a box and return it. I would say save your money or go directly through Bissell
customer_reviews.author: Crystale

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine only 2 issues
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best rug cleaners I've ever used. It's so easy to use, easy to clean and really does an amazing job. I only have 2 complaints. 1. These water capacity needs to be at least twice as big. It can only manage to clean about a third of a room with one tank. 2. Mine arrived and it had droplets of water inside which I assume was from testing at the plant it was built. It made the tank smell a little funky. Fix these two things Bissell and I'll give you 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bissell Pro-Heat 2 that lasted about 10 years. This one does a great job. Thought I was going to have to buy new carpets. I even paid to have my carpets professionally cleaned. My carpets were worse! But after two uses of this machine my carpets look good again. It doesn't pick up the water well but it cleans great! Fans work to dry the carpets. Thing I love the most is how easy it is to take apart and clean the cleaner! Really love this carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: SRS

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a big "green machine". While it cleaned professionally it was so difficult to set up quickly and use. This product is a happy medium. The overall cleaning isn't quite as good as the " big green machine", but it is so much more user friendly. Refilling the clean water reservoir is easy, but for large jobs you must do it multiple times. We are glad we bought this product. Likely in the future we will buy another "big green machine" for times we want to do whole house carpet cleaning days.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived it looked like it had already been opened. It was not sealed by tape or anything. I used it once on very short carpet. Yes, I vacuumed beforehand and removed anything that shouldn’t be in the way. The belt broke and the plastic broke on it. I didn’t inspect this plastic before using it. I thought everything would be fine since it was brand new. I’m not sure if it was before or during I used it. I’m not happy with my purchase . It could not even complete one room.
customer_reviews.author: Janiecelouise

customer_reviews.title: Very poor suction. Leave most dirty water in carpet. Read Reviews for the 'real ones'...
customer_reviews.text: Long ago I relied on Amazon reviews. High stars meant a good product to me. Now, as I read across the internet it seems many 'good' reviews are likely from people who receive goods or compensation. Do yourself a favor and read through the 2-3 star reviews and you will see many reviews with poor suction. It seemed to leave over 3 quarters of the water in the rug whereas my 15 year old Hover picked up over 3 quarters. Very poor and disappointed with the product.... I wish my old Hover didn't stop working...
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Customer...

customer_reviews.title: Great Deep Cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner and gets under your furniture as well. This is the second on of these I have purchased. That should tell you a lot. This does a tremendous job of getting your carpet clean. And I mean deep clean. I ran this over carpet that I had been cleaning with another unit and WOW! Left stripes where the unit went over it. The low front end is a real nice feature also. allows you to clean under things most other cleaners will not. You do need to keep it clean from hair and dirt build up to get optional performance. I clean mine after every use and no problems. I am impressed and very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: dogs

customer_reviews.title: If nothing else worked, try this.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing, it cleans incredibly deep. It cleaned the cat smell out of my rental carpet, and washed my friend's 10 year old sofa making it look like new. Also you can take it apart and wash well, which I really like. The only complaint I have is about the water container. It's a bit clumsy, making it hard to unload to dump out the dirty water. Other than that, it's a great purchase! Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm really impressed
customer_reviews.text: So, given all the carpet cleaners on the market - I settled on this, and man am I glad I did. This has great suction, is SUPER EASY to clean and just does a great job. Super simple, super effective and again - SUPER EASY to clean. I can't stress how important it is that you can snap the top off and clean it. My old hoover carpet cleaner, I needed my power drill to disassemble each time I cleaned the carpets. It was easier to clean a carburetor than it was the hoover. Thank you Bissel for understanding features that make sense!
customer_reviews.author: Big Lou in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because we have 4 dogs 2 little and 2 big... as most people know with little dogs they don’t like peeing outside in rain or cold weather so they pee inside. We bought this cause of the brand and thought it would be the best. Apon washing the area multiple time the vacuum doesn’t suck up near as much water as it drops and it mad the smell x1000 times worse I would not recommend this product to anyone complete waste of money and waiting on my return
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The belt was burning after 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought new, but came used. It was clean, but wet. I was frustrated and annoyed, but if it worked I was willing to overlook it. We used this for one room and thought, wow! It works ok. Nothing mind blowing, but we’ll keep it. I cleaned up the machine properly and left it for the night. The next morning I turned it on to do a second room and the belt was smoking within 2 minutes. Nope. Nope. Nope. Shipping it back today.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kuehl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine: Cleans Better than a Professional!
customer_reviews.text: We had to get our white carpet cleaned about every 3 months. This machine cleans better than the professionals and I already made my money back. The only thing is the cleaning solution cost a lot. However, I was able to make my own solution for less than a dollar and that solution also does a better job than the carpet cleaning formulas you can buy. The DIY cleaning solution video can be found on YouTube under the title: "Homemade Carpet Cleaner Solution // Best DIY Rug Doctor Copycat" by Karie Truman, HappyMoneySaver.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Stringfield

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The product name is a little misleading as the heat in the name would indicate that it is a heated cleaner. Not so much the case as most products in this price range require you to use warm to hot tap water. The unit itself helps to keep the water warmer longer. If you're a pet owner going through potty training you want to get the spot up right away. This just isn't practical if you load it up and get the one spot. Then you have 3/4 of a tank of solution and water, that will eventually get cold and heat benefits from cleaning are lost.
customer_reviews.author: ninjarollz

customer_reviews.title: The roller brushes really get down deep in the pile of your carpet for a real deep down clean... I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I have ever purchased for the same price it would have cost me to have someone come in and clean my carpets I was able to do them myself it only took a few hours to do 3 rooms, they look amazing!!! Also I have 2 yorkies and sometime they make messes would you know the next week one went weewee on the carpet, if I would have had somebody clean them I would have been livid, however with my new awesome machine I took it out and cleaned the mess in 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: DinaE2W

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied With This Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great. Took me a while to get used to going slow. I kept wanting to go back and forth like a vacuum cleaner but I finally got the hang of it. I also kept stepping on the power cord but I fixed that today when I cleaned the carpet in my den. I also went over the same areas more than 2 or 3 times to suck up as much solution as possible. That was something I didn't do when I cleaned my hallway last week. After you use it a couple of times you will get it dialed in to your style. I am very satisfied with the cleaning results and believe me my carpets were DIRTY.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wise

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. My carpets look great
customer_reviews.text: I researched and found that the Bissell ProHeat 2x Revolution was listed in the Top 5 of a Consumer News article. Since this machine was about $100 - $150 cheaper that the first 2 spots I ordered it. I LOVE it. My carpets look great! My last Bissell carpet shampooer lasted about 12 years and was used twice a year in my home along with all my kids various apartment moves. The difference between this shampooer and my old Bissell is that this machine is much easier to clean when I finished shampooing. I'm happy I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Works well cleaned the carpets better than I expected. Not to hard to push around, pretty easy to fill detergent container and empty dirty water container. For a machine like this I don’t think you can get much better. Some areas that are heavy traffic areas required a second or third going over. But the machine ran well and worked as advertised. Fill container with hot water and Bissell or equivalent detergent and go! Uses quite a bit of detergent for larger areas so the liquid detergent can get expensive. But all in all I was pleased with it’s cleaning ability.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman54

customer_reviews.title: Burning Belts on First Use
customer_reviews.text: Well, there is really only a dislike at this point. I turned the vacuum on for the first time this evening and immediately got smoke coming from what turned out to be the drive belt. I have no idea how the belt slipped off or how it is suppose to be put on in the first place. I contacted Bissell customer support, who were helpful and apologetic, but could only send me a new belt. I’m still unsure what caused the belt to not be in place in the first place. Hopefully, the replacement belt fixes the issue. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with vacuum or Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed - cleans okay but makes a terrible high pitched screaming sound. Almost unbearable to listen too. I have to turn it off and walk away after a little while. Would not recommend. Contacted customer services and didn’t come up with a resonable solution. All packaging and boxes had been thrown away and they wanted me to find my own new packaging and boxes for shipment before any resolution could be made.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Eugley

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, But Needs Some Improvements
customer_reviews.text: This machine replaced a Hoover than had a broken 50 cent NLA part that rendered it dead. The Bissell cleans dirt out of the carpets very well and did a great job on old couches that have a scotch guard coating. The machine seems designed for use in small areas, the detergent tank and the waste water tank are too small for use in larger rooms or far from a sink. When using Hoover Pet Messes Formula the waste tank foams so much that the useful capacity is only about half before the float stops the suction. Hopefully a defoamer solution will fix this. Other than that the machine is light, well designed, and easy to operate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the machine works well for cleaning rugs and carpets. I purposely got it for cleaning my room carpet due to dogs and my dog peeing on the cArpet. I paired it with the urine eliminator soap as well. I cleaned twice a few days apart and it still has not eliminated the urine. Overall you can tell that it definitely cleans very well with the dirty water being black. It does leak so I was cleaning up dirty water whenever I stopped the cleaner. So be sure to not stop it on carpet or it will leave a black spot from dirty water. Otherwise it did it’s job well. Cleanup is pretty simple as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Wow, unbelievable what this machine does
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews; I am making an exception for this product. We have two dogs, Golden and a mutt. We also have two cats. I have rented many carpet cleaners and had several different companies over the years. This machine is better than anything we have tried in the past!!! I paid full price so, this is an actual review. Took to my daughter's house and cleaned her carpets. She has a long haired German Shepard and two cats. The machine is getting a workout on very different carpets and keeps on working as good as it did out of the box. I highly recommend this product!!! We will be doing stairs this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble right out of the box! Only requires snapping together a few pieces and screwing in 1 screw! I purchased this product based upon other buyer reviews...and they weren't wrong! This cleaner is fabulous! Easy to fill, use, and empty! The suction is amazing and it cleans right up against walls! I was delightfully grossly surprised how much was pulled up out of our rental carpets! My only complaint is how small the water/solution and wastewater reservoirs are...it makes it a bit of a pain since you have to empty and fill so frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: How many product review sites rate this the best steam vaccum? All of them. I buy it, I follow the instructions, I pre-vacuum my carpet...and I put it to use. Starts off great. Then I realize it's leaving behind clumps of pet hair. So I call their customer service. We troubleshoot. They confirm it absolutely SHOULD be picking up the leftover hair. They tell me to take it to a authorized service center. I call the center and what does the guy tell me? "No, those things are only designed to pick up soil, not anything else. You need to Pre-vacuum better !" So that's some conflicting information. Looks like I'll be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: patricia guzman

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint about this machine is that the brush roll still spins when you are using the hand tool. After one use of using the tools I am already replacing the brush roll at the cost of $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: After using all the water in the clean tank it sucked up maybe a cup worth of water into the dirty tank. I read all the directions and used it exactly how it recommended. I even did a bunch of extra dry runs over the wet carpet and it didn’t help. Maybe mine was defected or something because the suction was terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old Berber carpet looks like new
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 3 year old Hoover machine. This is the BEST MACHINE I HAVE USED TO DATE!! Have old Berber carpet and this makes it look new every time! Usually shampoo every 4 weeks because of animals and kids. The heated version really does help the carpet to dry faster. For someone that has always had another brand, this has definitely impressed me. May be expensive, but its worth every penny. Bought the tile floor attachment from Bissell, and now use it in the entire house!! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this carpet cleaner. I've never owned a steam cleaner, nor have I used one before. I am a furr mom of 4 (2 dogs and 2 cats), this item is a miracle worker and couldn't be more happier that I spent the extra money on this particular one. I only did my basement which has light/beige carpet and I noticed a huge difference immediately. I feel like if your going to buy one, you should just pay the extra difference and get one that's going to get the job done the first time instead of going with a cheaper one that will need multiple cleanings. :)
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Ok I bought this to clean my carpeted bedroom floors. It cleaned the light dirt in the walkway (I would say 8/10. It made the caroet super wet! Took more than a day to dry. It is heavy for me. I used the cleaning products of Bissell with it. I don’t think it is worth buying because I only used it once. It was too much work for me. We do not wear shoes in the house and the dirt level was very low. I guess it would be useful for those who will use it regularly and if they don’t mind the wet carpet afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: FL Mom

customer_reviews.title: At last, clean rugs.
customer_reviews.text: I've been having my rugs and upholstery professionally cleaned, but they never looked clean. I knew I would have to tackle this myself. So upon reading all the prior reviews, I bought this one. I'm 84 years old and 5 ft. tall, and I was able to handle this powerful machine. Now I smile when I see my rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Sallyayne

customer_reviews.title: A must if you are a pet owner
customer_reviews.text: The number of accidents my dogs have is extremely rare unless I'm at work too long. I typically just use a vacuum and then deep clean the carpet once every month or two with this machine. For the quality cleaning you get from this I feel that it is a steal for the price. If anyone wants a carpet cleaner and owns pets I would totally recommend this product. Also, I like the feature for spot treatment and the attachments so you can clean an isolated spot.
customer_reviews.author: Gisell D'Onofrio

customer_reviews.title: Great at deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit after our 3 year old Bissell wore out. The suction on this unit is great and it's lighter than the previous model. It cleans very, very well and dry time (due to better suction) is improved. A couple downers: 1) It's lousy for stairs as the tank doesn't detach and the hose isn't long enough to reach, so you have to schlep the unit around to give you the reach you need, and 2) the dirty water tank has a funky rubber stopper which flaps shut when emptying the tank - that's inconvenient. Overall, I would purchase the unit again and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Girl

customer_reviews.title: TOP TOP TOP TOP !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs and 3 cats and usually I was renting machines from constructions houses... Honestly they are heavy, difficult to move among the stairs, etc.. This machine is simply FANTASTIC... I really loved it. Clean very well, the upholstery hose is amazing with dry and wet options, the dirty water and clean water remains in separated containers, easy to use, easy to move and it is VERY EFFICIENT. I can tell the engineering behind this machine is fantastic!!!! My only recommendation to the manufacture is to add a QR code in your manual that links directly to your how-to videos, thus the consumer does not need to browser and find the videos by him/herself. Amazing product.. super recommended!
customer_reviews.author: zstarfox

customer_reviews.title: USED AND MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: First off I have a covered entry? The box was soaked. Once inside I opened Amazon box and saw the cleaner box with a long straight cut down it? Not its first shipping? Box was literally falling apart from water damage, but there was plastic bags over the electronics. Looks like it has been used and missing 30% of parts ? Dont get jeff b. DONT BUY THIS. I'm sure, I hoped it works great . Buy from another retailer. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.author: bigmike

customer_reviews.title: You can buy even without pets!
customer_reviews.text: No pets. Just wanted a good carpet cleaner, and this is it. Because no pets or kids, did most of house with just water. Worked like a charm. Last load put in a bit if detergent and went over areas again that needed it. Crazy easy to clean after use. It's a well thought-out machine. And, it spits out little carpet fuzz balls as it cleans; so, I feel like I've adopted a cat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Borgens

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this for pet mess.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even waste your money. I got a new puppy so I figured I’d get this for accidents. All it does is spread the urin around the carpet with the brushes. It basically makes the stain even bigger. You’d be better off spot cleaning with a towel like the old days. Really, do not buy this for pet accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Bissell. Although I like this machine it is no different than my old one except you can clean the rollers. My 1st proheat was awesome, it heated the water and the suction was great. The last 2 the suction was okay. It's a timing thing. Go a little faster when dispensing cleaner and then go slower when suctioning. Being able to clean the rollers is a great touch, but I'm not sure there is anything else about this cleaner that stands out and makes it worth the price, that is why I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best carpet scrubber I have ever used. Professional quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Bissell ProHeat 2x Revolution is equipped with suction and power that delivers a true professional cleaning! I am absolutely shocked at how well the ProHeat 2x completely and thoroughly renewed my carpet!! The suction worked so well that my carpets were practically dry when finished. The ProHeat 2x was very easy to operate and has great attachments! I can’t say enough positive things about my experience with this Bissell model! This Bissell is outstanding!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jo jo

customer_reviews.title: As good as a professional unit.
customer_reviews.text: The Bissell Pro Heat simply does an amazing job at cleaning carpets. It is as effective as hiring a carpet cleaning service. I bought this to replace a Bissell unit that is 10 or more years old. This one is much more convenient, faster, easier to operate and cleans much better. It is very easy to clean lint and pet hair from the machine to keep the vacuum clear. Definitively a worthwhile upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My experience is the same as the other 1 star reviews. I gave it an extra star because somehow it manages to get the dried on dog slobber off my stone floors. I have to squeegee them, because of the poor suction. I was never able to get the hard surface attachment on. & this thing is LOUD. If you use it on a regular basis you need to use ear protection. I'll use it until it breaks and throw it away, which I suspect won't be too soon. I wouldn't recommend using it on HW floors. Attachment or not. Too much water. Edit: Broke today. 4 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction so what’s the point
customer_reviews.text: We had the Hoover Smartwash prior to this. It was fantastic. Every time we used it the tank was full of filthy water and the carpet was dry. This is the comparable Bissell version. It does not have a rinse mode. It does not have good suction and therefore did not clean the carpets. Just left them dirty and soaking wet. I know for a fact the water in the intake tank should have been almost black but it was nice and clean. It’s definitely not pulling any dirt from the carpet. We also purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A work horse.
customer_reviews.text: Did an awesome job cleaning carpet that had never been cleaned in 10 years. Used Sunny & Honey carpet soap. Was very happy with the results. Went over carpet twice with soap and had to go over it 4 times with plain water to get the soap out. Only complaint is that the tanks are small, had to refill 3 times to do my bedroom once. So that meant about 15 trips to the sink to do one room. But larger tanks would mean a larger machine... I get it. I was not compensated in any way for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This thing cleaned all of my carpet stains. I had stains of all sorts and this removed them. A few of them I had to go over multiple times and some I had to let soak and come back to, but it didn’t take much effort. I thought the cleanshot pretreat feature was gimmicky and unnecessary, but I found it to be extremely useful in removing deep stains!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The product I received wasn't didn't include an instruction manual so I'm not sure if I was using it properly or not but I used it as I did with other products and it just wasn't picking up much. The floor was left extremely wet. The product I received may have been defective or it just doesn't work as expected. Refund in progress.
customer_reviews.author: Tasharia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: we have three large dogs four cats and live on a dirt rd We have hard wood floors, good runners and throw carpets. The cleaner works wonders on the carpets and the hardwood floors. It's easy to take apart, to remove built up pet hair. It's solid and the furniture brush attaches easily. The hole to empty the dirty water isn't the most efficient - but it's a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY Penny
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering the purchase of this item or evaluating this carpet cleaner stop thinking and go buy this thing. I did a bit of research and looked at other lesser priced options but then I came across a few YouTube reviews that compared this unit against others and I was sold. I have a couple of feline friends that have destroyed the carpet in my apartment however after today my five-year-old cat tested carpet looks and smells like brand new. Words cannot describe how good this machine is. This machine is truly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for single floor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during pandemic as Rug doctors are not being rented out. This is great for home use. Looking at the dirty bucket I can tell it cleaned the carpet fairly well. For best results pretreat any old stains. It's light and easy to operate in rooms. Stairs are not so easy as the handheld head is much smaller. I have not tried cleaning area rugs or upholstery yet. Buy it if you have space to store.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine, I received it today, I've called Bissel twice today with silly questions, both times they were very helpful. Just got a puppy, (and we all know what that means) my 40 year old carpet looks new. I love, love , love that I can clean the machine after it's used. Thank you BISSELL !!!!
customer_reviews.author: ivka conway

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, might need to run more passes to dry
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice, easy to use product. Was appropriately heavy, but did not hurt my back while using it. I used it on a think shag Pyle carrier and the carpet was still quite damp days later. I ended up replacing the carpet, but would advise running this several passes more to dry better. I used the deep clean setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dentel

customer_reviews.title: Fine for small areas
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Bissell carpet cleaner. This is the first one that has separate tanks for clean water/detergent and dirty water. It has ok suction, just remember to resell the rubber seal on the waste tank. But the two tanks need to be removed and either emptied or refilled at different times in the cleaning process. Makes for lots of trips to the laundry room or kitchen sink. Also the other Bissell cleaners had dials to switch from using cleaner or just rinsing. This one uses the cleaning solution at all times. I find that it takes longer to clean my large family room with this cleaner but it does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old one, but carpets are pretty wet...
customer_reviews.text: We've had stains that our old Hoover couldn't seem to get out -- in one wash, they are already gone with this thing! We're very impressed. However, the carpets were still slightly damp 24 hours later, and that was in our very open living room. Our walk-in closet took almost 2 days to dry out. We've started using a fan and a small space heater to dry the carpets out faster. Even so, we can deal with damp carpets as long as they're clean, and they're DEFINITELY clean now!
customer_reviews.author: JBarnosky

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed wool Berber carpet
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Since cleaning solution and water in same tank you have to pass over with solution water until tank drains, then pass with 2nd tank of clear water to rinse. Also no way to turn off brushes. Manual says to limited passes over Berber carpet. But even then carpet was completely wreaked. Out $500 for a machine I will never use again and $5k worth of wool Berber carpet which is now a matted, fuzzy mess. And machine didn’t even remove the dog pee stains. Very bad design. Would it have cost that much more for a brush on/off switch
customer_reviews.author: Michele Boddy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: When my old bissel Big green Machine finally gave up and died, I bought this one. I wish I had bought it a long time ago! Holy cow is this thing amazing! It gets up so much, so fast! Places that my old machine struggled with, this machine gets out quickly! We use fireplaces to heat our home in the winter, so our carpets get pretty dirty during the winter months. But dang! I am not at all worried about it now!
customer_reviews.author: Andra Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small water container
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest carpet cleaner I have ever used. Only complaint is the water containers are super small. I have to fill up several times when cleaning 1 room. I went through 5 containers doing my stairs alone. It did an amazing job, and to be fair my last carpet cleaner broke about 3 years ago so it had been a very long time since they last got washed (ewww).
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Reduce the stress in your life
customer_reviews.text: What took me so long to realize that with two dogs, I needed a quality Shampooer? Despite weekly cleaning, my house always smelled like dogs. This machine is so well designed: it's easy, the carpet looks even more beautiful and it dries fast. If you have pet(s), buy this and it will reduce the stress in your life.
customer_reviews.author: imaFox

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and it works very well. I did overfill it with solution though and it has left a lot of soapy residue on my carpet. I am going to fill it only with water when I get home this evening and rinse my carpet again to see if that gets rid of all the residue. Besides that assembly is very straight forward, it's easy to fill, easy to empty and easy to clean the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with this machine. The soap goes directly into the water so there isn't a rinse option. Also we had a soda stain on our carpet that after 3 tries was still there. I ended up using my old carpet machine and store bought shampoo to remove the stain. 3rd, the dirty water tank fills before you are half way through the clean water. So there is a lot of extra dumping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Better than a rug doctor mainly bc its easy to empty,refill, & move around but is just as strong and effective, actually used a rug doctor on same room 2x and first picture is my first run and 2nd is 3 runs after, mine you our roommates haven't cleaned or vacuumed in almost 5yrs, the rug doctor got the worst layer resulting in a oil like darkness after 30 runs its finally a lite cloudy water, i dont wanna stop ha but it actually says don't stop till it runs clear so no problem there at least it'll be brand new carpet after lol highly recommend for any job in the house
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for cat urine removal; everything now smells like cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: Used it in combination with their cat-urine removal product. We carefully read all instructions and followed them. it did NOT clean the cat urine stains on the carpet. What it DID do was mix the cat urine with the water and spread it out all over the carpet. Our carpet is completely ruined and we'll have to replace it. Please don't buy this product, because you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It clean very well. We had someone stay with our dogs, while we were out of town. This person allowed the dogs to pee in multiple placed in our house. We were horrified when we came home -- The smell!!! We ordered the machine and the special cleaners. the one we used was to Pet Pro Oxy Urine Eliminator. It worked wonders. I was very concerned because some of the urine had dried, and that can be difficult to remove the smell -- but the machine with this wonderful cleaning solution did the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of bride to be

customer_reviews.title: Best Carpet Cleaner I Have Owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Bissell Carpet Cleaner which finally, after many years, gave out. After researching various brands & models I selected this particular cleaner and couldn't have made a better choice. It is easy to use and does an exceptional job. I have a cat and the occasional mess on the carpet is easily cleaned up. The cleaner is also easily broken down for cleaning after use. I highly recommend this carpet cleaner!!
customer_reviews.author: David Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Had great hopes for this machine, unfortunately they didnt pan out. This machine only picks up about 5% of the water that is put down. The float is not stuck, the dirty water tank is seated correctly, it just doesnt pull the dirty water out of the carpet. That would be the most important part. Without pulling the dirty water out your just spinning your wheels. Very disappointed in the product. If you press down hard on the front of the machine you get more water out but that's not how this was advertised to be used. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: paul audet

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Carpet Cleaner- Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: For a home cleaner this is fantastic. I had a Big Green Machine years ago and this carpet cleaner is just as good in my opinion. I went over my carpet twice since we have 4 dogs and it just did a fantastic job getting up pet stains, which includes urine from a little rescue dog we have. And trust me. She had little potty stains everywhere. I haven’t used it on the stairs yet, but I will. I can’t think of any dislikes I have for this yet. But if I do, I’ll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CARPET CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: For months we studied carpet cleaners, just couldn't decide what would fit our needs the best. We have wall to wall carpet upstairs and downstairs and very thick. Our friends recommended the Bissell telling us that it was a workhorse. That was a good sales pitch for us so we ordered it last year. IT IS GREAT! Couldn't be easier to use and the products put out by Bissell are equally as fine for cleaning pet stains (YEAH), food drops, etc. SO HAPPY this was the one we bought. Youtube videos also helped us decide and once we got it the videos gave us great pointers on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: MissouriMule1

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is an initial review. Will be updating later. Setting it up was easy. Thanks to their youtube video tutorial. The carpet deep cleaning is awesome. Cleaned my super nasty carpet so great I can finally step my bare feet on it again. The suction will stop sucking when the dirty water gallon is full enough that it’s time to throw it away. Once you do that the suction will work again. I had to use it for a long period of time because my carpet was so dirty but it did not overheat or had a burning smell. Of course I had it rest for a few minutes interval.
customer_reviews.author: Emmerald

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without this? I have two small dogs who are older and there are accidents at least once a day. This thing is awesome. I know I'm getting a deep clean and have the dirty water to prove it; plus the stain disappears! VERY happy! Update 2019: still runs like a champ. Now one of my dogs is incontinent so this bad boy is getting used at least once a week. I use it with the Bissell carpet solution. So very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernVAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months - the belt brush broke and now the brushes no longer turn. I contacted Bissell and was advised I would need to buy a new belt, since it was not covered under the 5-year Limited warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: My Pekepom is Mad at Me
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. We have a tiny dog (Pekingese-Pomeranian mix) who unfortunately marks, and after using different products over the years - rug doctor, nature’s miracle, etc - we thought there was no saving our carpet. After just one use of this cleaner, years of stains and odor are GONE. I was admittedly skeptical, but was willing to pay the price of purchase to save thousands of dollars of replacing flooring, and I am so glad I did. Easy to assemble. Easy to fill. Definitely easy to empty and clean. HIGHLY RECOMMEND to any pet owner.
customer_reviews.author: ECG

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye dirty carpet
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Easy to assemble and use. The handheld tool is perfect for hard to reach areas and tight spots. I have used this product 3 times now once on the normal clean setting and twice on deep clean. Carpet dried very fast on both settings and it was amazing at how much came out of the carpet. Once carpet was dry it became fluffier! There were a few stains that didn't completely disappear but definitely become less visible. The best part was how much odors disappeared after using. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: MAMABEAR

customer_reviews.title: Spotless Shag White Carpet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for obvious reasons. I had a dirty carpet that really needed a deep clean. However my carpet is white and I was honestly a little skeptical about how well it would remove set in urine stains that I had previously attempted to clean with a spot cleaner. This cleaner went ABOVE AND BEYOND my expectations. My carpet is now completely back to its original color and it smells and feels fantastic! Additional note: my carpet is an extremely high pile shag rug and the roller brushes did not catch or rip anything (this was another big concern of mine). Thank you bissell for another amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned all of our couches and carpet with no issues. Gets deep down and we couldnt believe what came out of our light gray carpet which did not look dirty at all. Also cleaned our area rugs that were on top of our wood floor with no moisture at all coming through to ruin the floor beneath, it suck all the water back up almost immediately with a very short dry time (about 5 hours). Only complaint I have would be I wish the hose was a little longer and I wish there was a way to stop the brushes from spinning on the vacuum itself when using the hand attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Suction was very good!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and reading reviews on Bissell, Rug Dr and Hoover cleaners. I owned a Bissell in the past and was not impressed but after reading reviews I decided to try Bissell again. I can’t be happier with the results I got from this cleaner. It worked wonderfully. I used it on our carpet and our large couches and it all looks clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Vikkie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2020
customer_reviews.text: This machine is the best purchase I’ve made in 2020. It is life changing!! I’m pregnant and have an older dog that has multiple accidents. I smell everything, I needed my house to stop smelling like “dead hamster” and this did the trick!! It’s disgusting and amazing how much dirt and dog pee was pulled out of my carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every penny. Did a better job than professional cleaners did. I do worry about breathing in the chemicals (that do such a wonderful job), so I wait to use it on a day I can open all the windows. If you're using the handheld on stairs or cushions it takes some muscle to do a good job. I am absolutely in love with this vacuum. It is INCREDIBLY effective-very satisfying to see the before/after. Will make your carpet look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got really excited at first after pretty easy assemble part and ready to use the vacuum. Cleans great, I was able to get rid of some really old stains on my old area rug. Super easy to fill and easy to clean. Works great. But then unfortunately the clean water tank started leaking. At first when I was carrying it and then even when I put it into the vacuum tight. Thankfully I’m waiting on the replacement to come, but disassembling and getting the old one back into the box to took me literally 30 minutes. Really hard to take apart, especially the handle. Even “easy” YouTube video didn’t help much!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: It does great on pet stains and just dirty carpets
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times and it works very well. It does great on pet stains and just dirty carpets. If you pre-treat an area it does excellent. I pre-treat the high traffic and pet stains and am very pleased. As long as you keep it maintained by not letting debris clog it up this will last a while. I recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laliberte

customer_reviews.title: Great home carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I almost gave this a full 5 stars. It really does the job well and I don't have any serious complaints. I knocked off one star mostly because I am worried about the amount of plastic they used for it. Yes, it's good strong plastic but I'm sure I'll be replacing parts and pieces over time as the plastic becomes brittle. I wish the upholstery attachment worked a little bit better- again, it is really good but just shy of 5-start great. All things considered, this is a really nice carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and patience
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Do not buy. I bought it and the first time I used it the brushes didn’t move and the whole thing started smoking. The belt is fine. Nothing obstructing the belt or brushes. I tried to get a refund from amazon but they basically wanted me to take the whole damn thing apart to see what the problem is. That’s not my job, especially when it’s right out of the box. Long story short, DO NOT BUY! It’s a fire hazard and is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been staring at dark spot on the carpets in my family room and office for 4 years. Nothing took them out. Too costly to replace with tile. Professional cleaners wanted more than the cost of this magnificent machine to come and clean (plus the mess of moving everything around). Let me tell you - and, no doubt about it - this is BY FAR THE BEST MOST EFFICIENT, EASIEST TO USE carpet cleaner I've ever owned!! It is a POWERHOUSE!!!!!!! So if you are tempted and like to freshen up carpet/rugs (especially with pets) consider this a "PAMPER YOURSELF" purchase and get it!!!!! I absolutely LOVE mine!!!!!! Thanks Bissell!!! You knocked this one out of the park!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sager

product_meta.title: Bissell ProHeat 2X Revolution Max Clean Pet Pro Full-Size Carpet Cleaner, 1986, with Antibacterial Formula
product_meta.description: Style Name:Revolution Pet onlyJust like you, we love our pets, but, eventually, every pet makes a mess. Whether it's tracked-in mud or even accidents, Bissell Pro Heat 2X Revolution Pet Pro handles tough pet messes thanks to the exclusive Pet Pro Cleanup System. The system includes Clean Shot Pretreated to remove spots and stains; the 2-in-1 Pet Upholstery Tool to remove pet hair, stains and odors from upholstery; a trial size of Bissell Professional Pet Urine Eliminator + Oxy; And an EZ Clean Brush Roll Cover to make maintenance of the machine easy. Plus, Deep Clean mode offers powerful cleaning to out clean the leading rental, and carpets dry in about 30 minutes with Express Clean Mode. All of this cleaning power comes in a lightweight and maneuverable machine with a low-profile foot that gets under furniture. With the Bissell Pro Heat 2X Revolution Pet Pro, you have everything you need to take on tough pet messes. Buying this product saves pets. Bissell proudly supports Bissell Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a Bissell product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
feature_bullets: Buy Bissell, save pets; Bissell donates up to 10 dollars to the Bissell pet foundation for every pet product purchase, upon activation
New max clean mode, combined with 12 rows of rotating dual dirt lifter power brushes, delivers professional grade cleaning to remove deep down embedded stains, dirt and odors
Our fastest dry time ever; New and improved express clean mode delivers dry carpets in about 30 minutes
To attack the toughest stains, activate the clean shot pretreated to deliver a concentrated stream of cleaning solution right where you need it
Light weight design (less than 18 pounds) and low profile foot makes it easy to use and maneuver around furniture
2 in 1 Pet Upholstery Tool removes pet hair, stains and odors from upholstery
EZ clean brush roll cover makes cleaning the machine after a deep clean quick and easy
Engineered to be our best and most powerful carpet cleaning system for the toughest pet stains and odors even removes skunk odor

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,920 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
